job_tasks.phrase: Design, implement and maintain new features for the DeepL Business Technology space, collaborating with multiple engineering teams
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the process of building and maintaining software features, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and maintain enterprise-level enablement services as per our technical agreements with customers and requirements from the product management team
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development and maintenance of services, aligning with the software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to monitoring the services in production, e.g. by defining expressive metrics and ensuring informative logs
job_tasks.justification: Monitoring services in production by defining metrics and logs is a core component of operations engineering (MLOps).

job_tasks.phrase: technical agreements with customers and requirements from the product management team
job_tasks.justification: This indicates the need to understand customer agreements and product management requirements, which relates to business understanding.

soft_skills.phrase: leading with empathy makes us better together
we value your initiatives, impact, and creativity

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional software development and operations engineering tasks. There is no mention of generative AI, LLMs, or related technologies, which are core to the GenAI Engineer profile. Therefore, it falls outside the scope of a GenAI Engineer.
